amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.catchline: Public utility districts; assessments; when due; equalization; interest.
amendatorysection.para: The special tax provided in section 18-405 shall be paid in ten installments. The first installment, or one-tenth of the tax, shall become due and delinquent fifty days after the date of levy, and one-tenth of such tax shall become due and delinquent each year thereafter, counting from the date of levy, for nine years. The special tax shall bear interest at a rate not to exceed the rate of interest specified in section 45-104.01, as such rate may from time to time be adjusted by the Legislature, prior to delinquency, and at the rate specified in section 45-104.01, as such rate may from time to time be adjusted by the Legislature, after delinquency. Prior to the levy of the special tax as provided in section 18-405, such tax shall be equalized in the same manner as provided by law for the equalization of special assessments levied in such cities, such villages, and the city of the metropolitan class within such metropolitan utilities district respectively.
